name: GramMars Wars - Grammar Game
description:
GramMars Wars is a game to learn English grammar. Use a team of monsters to fight the evil aliens using grammar. It features incredible graphics and animations in a space theme. It contains over 100 different types of quizzes. The app will track your progress and adapt to your level.

Learn nouns, pronouns, adjectives, prepositions, possessives, linking verbs, present simple, future perfect, past continuous, spelling, object complements, indirect objects, advance vocabulary, verbals, types of sentences, etc.

        • Campaign mode with over 300 different levels.

        • Rating system that adapts the difficulty of the game to your proficiency.

        • More than 100 different grammar topics with thousands of questions.

        • Interactive just-in-time tutorials to learn.

        • Each card has its skill and passive skill.

        • Evolve cards to unlock hidden powers.

        • English Score calculated from your proficiency in campaign and learning mode.

        • Daily challenge to test your knowledge and team and obtain unique rewards to power up your monsters.

        • Rank against other players by collecting commander points after each played match.
